title: how does riot manage leaver buster
body:
why is it so crap, you bugsplat and you still get leaver buster, your internet disconnects and then you still get leaver buster, do they understand that there's more to a situation than going afk? I reconnect as soon as i can but its just fucking useless to the point i shouldnt even bother playing anymore because im going to get leaver buster no matter what. you might as well fucking troll because you might as well have fun for waiting 20 minutes just to end up losing.

is there any way to prevent getting leaver buster besides TRYING to reconnect as soon as you can?

replies.body: "i shouldnt even bother playing anymore". you answered your own question. why is it when you come into a game, dc, and leave your team to be pretty much doomed, you dont think about how you've ruined their game you think about you not being able to play and blame riot and their system for punishing assholes like you who continue to play despite having bad internet.
